reviews.text: Luxurious and wonderful boutique hotel in la Palmeraie, just 15 minutes from la Medina (old city). New, warm and quiet hotel, nice suites with beautiful design and furnishes, just the bathroom are quiet small (Diplomatic suites). Excellent restaurant and friendly staff. The swiming pool and gardens are outstanding.
reviews.title: Wonderful Boutique Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a wonderful hotel for relax and visit Marrakech. We enjoyed the swiming pool and restaurant (food excellent and staff warm and friendly). We went every day to visit the Medina in taxi (Abdou) reccomended by the reception staff. Youseef at the reception is an excellent professional and help you in all you need.
reviews.title: A True Luxurious Oasis

likes.disliked: — Choice of food at the restaurant
